Race.SpecificTitle: PW Police Jury -- 1 Mill - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition
(Health Unit Tax Continuation)

Summary:  Continuation of a 10-year, one-mill property tax for the purpose of constructing, equipping, maintaining and operating a Parishwide health unit for the Parish of Morehouse, title to which shall be in the public.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Morehouse, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), under the provisions of Article VI, Sections 30 and 32 of the Constitution of the State of Louisiana of 1974, continue to levy and collect a special tax of one (1) mill on all property subject to taxation in the Parish for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2012 and ending with the year 2021, for the purpose of constructing, equipping, maintaining and operating a Parishwide health unit for the Parish, title to which shall be in the public (estimated annual revenues: $152,280)?

Race.SpecificTitle: Ward Two Cemetery Tax -- 0.98 Mill - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Ward Two Proposition
(Cemetery Tax Continuation)

Summary:  Continuation of a 10-year, 0.98-mill property tax for providing and maintaining streets, aisles, outside fences, drainage and buildings that may be necessary for use of the sexton or caretaker and for providing for the employment of a sexton or caretaker and for cutting of grass and planting and care of trees and shrubbery and flowers in any cemetery in Ward Two of the Parish, title to which shall be in the public and which shall be under the control of the governing authority of the Parish.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Morehouse, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), under the provisions of Article VI, Sections 30 and 32 of the Constitution of the State of Louisiana of 1974 and Section 2740.1 of Title 33 of the Louisiana Revised Statutes of 1950, as amended, continue to levy and collect a special tax of ninety-eight hundredths (0.98) of one mill on all the property subject to taxation in Ward Two of the Parish, for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2012 and ending with the year 2021, for the purpose of providing and maintaining streets, aisles, outside fences, drainage and buildings that may be necessary for use of the sexton or caretaker and for providing for the employment of a sexton or caretaker and for cutting of grass and planting and care of trees and shrubbery and flowers in any cemetery in Ward Two of the Parish, title to which shall be in the public and which shall be under the control of the governing authority of the Parish (estimated annual revenues: $11,085)?
